body_html: Yeah, I would go for moving the stuff out of the constant op to the fill functor. If you feel that it is a generic library that could be used by more than one, then you could extract it out of constant op and have both depend on it.

body: Yeah, I would go for moving the stuff out of the constant op to the fill functor. If you feel that it is a generic library that could be used by more than one, then you could extract it out of constant op and have both depend on it.
